casebody.data:
The Canfield Rubber Co., appellant, v. Isaac B. Kleinert, respondent. Decided June 1, 1885. Appeal from order denying plaintiff’s motion to continue an injunction during the pendency of the action, and dissolving the prehminary injunction. Stearns & Curtis, for appellant. Stern & Myers, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Oh. J., and Freedman, J.

Opinion per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with costs.
